titleStmt.title: Tvvo ordinances of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, the one, for compositions for warships in the Court of Wards and Liveries, and for signing of bills, and passing of them under the Great Seal. The other, for taking away the fifth part of delinquents [sic] estates, formerly granted by an ordinance of Parliament, for maintaining of the wives and children of delinquents.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband ... and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this be forthwith printed and published. H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D.Com."
Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of text.
Bound and filmed as 7th item with 2753:6-2753:15.
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
